content.prompt: Which of the following site factors is most significant in explaining the expansion of urban areas of Tokyo and Los Angeles following the Second World War?

choices.label: Flat, open plains along mountainous coastlines
Seismic hazards and plate tectonic boundaries

unit.text: 6: Cities and Urban Land-Use Patterns and Processes

topic.text: 6.1: The Origin and Influences of Urbanization

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Explain the significance of geographic similarities and differences among different locations and/or at different times.
